Title: An Act Naming the Court of First Instance Building in the Municipality of Kalibo, Province of Aklan, the Godofredo P. Ramos Hall of Justice
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 117
An Act Naming the Court of First Instance Building in the Municipality of Kalibo, Province of Aklan, the Godofredo P. Ramos Hall of Justice
Section 1. The Court of First Instance Building in the Municipality of Kalibo, Province of Aklan, is hereby named the Godofredo P. Ramos Hall of Justice.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: January 21, 1981
